RTC (FB)
RTC (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK RTC
Calculates the elapsed time since a given start time
Usage Examples:
This function block can be used as an operation hour counter, when
PDT
is set to
DT#1970-01-01-00-00:00
, or is simply not connected.
This function block can be used to return the current date and time,
by adjusting the FB to the current local time. Just, set the input
PDT
to the current local time, on the rising edge of
EN
.
Note
This counter will have an overflow at the 7th February, 2106.
(* Example in ST *)
RTC
(
EN
:=
VarBOOL1
,
PDT
:=
DT#2006-03-30-14:00:00
,

VarBOOL2
,
